${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:BlackWidow.NAME: Black Widow
${modID}:BlackWidow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 1 *Assassin's *Mark. NL Apply 1 Weak.
${modID}:BlackWidow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 1 *Assassin's *Mark. NL Apply 1 Weak.

${modID}:AngelFighter.NAME: Angel Fighter
${modID}:AngelFighter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every attack card on your hand.
${modID}:AngelFighter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every attack card on your hand.

${modID}:AngelPriestess.NAME: Angel Priestess
${modID}:AngelPriestess.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! life for every skill card on your hand.
${modID}:AngelPriestess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! life for every skill card on your hand.

${modID}:Beastman.NAME: Beastman
${modID}:Beastman.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every attack card on your hand.
${modID}:Beastman.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every attack card on your hand.

${modID}:BlueBug.NAME: Blue Bug
${modID}:BlueBug.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn if you have less than half of your hp, heal 3 life. NL Otherwise gain 3 Block.
${modID}:BlueBug.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn if you have less than half of your hp, heal 3 life. NL Otherwise gain 3 Block.

${modID}:CentaurFighter.NAME: Centaur Fighter
${modID}:CentaurFighter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! damage to the rest of monsters.
${modID}:CentaurFighter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! damage to the rest of monsters.

${modID}:CommanderArmstrong.NAME: Commander Armstrong
${modID}:CommanderArmstrong.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every card on your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CommanderArmstrong.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage for every card on your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CthoolAcolyte.NAME: Cthool Acolyte
${modID}:CthoolAcolyte.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card and gain !B! Block.
${modID}:CthoolAcolyte.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card and gain !B! Block.

${modID}:DarkLord.NAME: Dark Lord
${modID}:DarkLord.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply !M! Poison.
${modID}:DarkLord.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply !M! Poison.

${modID}:DemonBride.NAME: Demon Bride
${modID}:DemonBride.DESCRIPTION: All monsters lose 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DemonBride.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All monsters loose 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DemonGuard.NAME: Demon Guard
${modID}:DemonGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every skill card in the hand. NL Lose 3 life.
${modID}:DemonGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every skill card in the hand. NL Lose 3 life.

${modID}:DesertCat.NAME: Desert Cat
${modID}:DesertCat.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Apply !M! Weak.
${modID}:DesertCat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:DesertFighter.NAME: Desert Fighter
${modID}:DesertFighter.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has Block, deal 16 damage. NL Otherwise deal 8 damage.
${modID}:DesertFighter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has Block, deal 16 damage. NL Otherwise deal 8 damage.

${modID}:DesertPriestess.NAME: Desert Priestess
${modID}:DesertPriestess.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.
${modID}:DesertPriestess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:DinoWarrior.NAME: Dino Warrior
${modID}:DinoWarrior.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 3 Vulnerable to yourself.
${modID}:DinoWarrior.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 3 Vulnerable to yourself.

${modID}:ElderFairy.NAME: Elder Fairy
${modID}:ElderFairy.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy doesn't have the intention to attack, gain 1 [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ElderFairy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy doesn't have the intention to attack, gain 1 [E].

${modID}:ElfRecruit.NAME: Elf Recruit
${modID}:ElfRecruit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! damage to the rest of monsters.
